item.title: Speed up GJR-GARCH with Numba
item.description: Speed up GJR-GARCH with Numba 1. Introduction GJR-GARCH is widely used for modeling the heteroskedasticity of assets’ return.

item.title: Model Confidence Set Python Implementation
item.description: Model Confidence Set Python Implementation The Model Confidence Set (MCS) is introduced by Hansen, Lunde, and Nason (2011, Econometrica).
